union_footnotes.+: Units have activation, transfer, and recovery restrictions; see Special Rule 8.

confederate_footnotes.*: May be activated by either Lee or Stewart in a Leader Activation action
confederate_footnotes.+: May not activate or entrench on Turn 1

union_footnotes.+: May not activate or entrench on Turn 1
May not activate on Turn 1 (see Special Rule 4)

confederate_footnotes.*: Begins game under a Breastworks marker

union_footnotes.*: Place Unmounted counter on top of Biddle; accompanies him the entire game (see Advanced Game, 5.5)

union_footnotes.*: Begins game on normal side with Fatigue Level 1 marker

confederate_footnotes.*: Placed on map on exhausted side with Fatigue 1 marker.
confederate_footnotes.+: Units may not activate on Turn 1 and do not recover on Turn 1 (see special rules).

union_footnotes.*: If the “Lyon’s Kentucky Raid” result has occurred on the Random Events Table, all six of the indicated leaders/brigades may never arrive as Union
union_footnotes.+: Units have activation, transfer, and recovery restrictions. See Scenario 9, Special Rule 7.
